p: Women have sensed more scent notes and they have rated the fragrance as more intense than men. According to women, the smell of celery seed oil was intense herb-like, spicy, and green with fresh, earthy, and medicinal notes. Men had a different opinion from women. From their point of view, the celery oil had fresh, mossy, and mushroom scent. It should be noted that women evaluated that the fragrance of oil was herbal and awarded it the maximum number of points, unlike men, who did not award any points there.
